Lunarpine saw the missles coming. He released his claws and crossed 
them as he stepped in front of Ramulus. The claws formed an energy 
shield that destroyed two of the missles on impact. A third missle 
knocked him off balance and the fourth continued toward Ramulus. 

"Come back here you cowards." he yelled at the top of his breath, 
trying to goat them back into battle. Lunarpine knew he had more 
tricks to try, he was actually pleased with the fact he may be able 
to try them yet.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (No KSL, that was the thing. Even though Vulois didn't know these 
> people, when he saw them he knew all their names. That's why he was 
> upset because something was going on.)
> 
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream was walking with the others, when he heard fire. He 
> stopped to see the Lavacons firing on Hell Beast, Gremlin and 
> Waspinator. He yelled.
> 
> "NO! Stop firing immdiatly! That's an order! We will have a battle 
> soon enough! Now come!" He kept walking.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois looked to Unitron.
> 
> "You're.....you're Unitron. I remember. Now unstrap me, you 
> blundering idiot!"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Trainers
> 
> Prebon smiled evily.
> 
> "Than let's make sure that he's dead. Fire two rockets at him. I 
will 
> do the same."
> 
> Prebon fired two missles at Ramulus and than continued flying away.
> 
> "And I got the Ninja bot with a chip. It's not going to make him 
one 
> of us, but it's in his spark. It will make him go mad with anger 
and 
> things, maybe attack the Maximals. It'll be great. And don't think 
> that we are done with the Maximals yet. We have not forgotten 
Spears, 
> and we will get her back."
> 
> He continued back to the base.
> 
> (Uh, Koj, did you say *Ki* in a post? That's the stuff they use in 
> DBZ. I thought we all agreed to stay away from DBZ.)
